title: Century-Old Dow Theory Flashes Bullish Sign for US Equity Rally
description: The Dow Jones Transportation Average has gained for nine consecutive days, a winning streak seen just five other times this century.  Truckers, shippers...
content: (Bloomberg) -- Equity traders looking for signs that a blistering stock-market advance is set to continue may take their cue from the companies that move goods across Americas roads, rails and waterw… [+2797 chars]
